name: GOBI & ENERGY CENTER TOUR
description: Gobi and Energy center tour is a unique trip that starts from the border between Mongolia and China. Our experienced tour guide and driver will pick you up at the train station.Upon arrival we will go to  a site which is considered as the energy center of the world. There, we will also visit a Buddhist temple, caves and a mountain that is believed to make your wish come true. And from there, we will visit the destinations in Gobi such as the Yol valley, sand dunes of Khongor, Flamming Cliffs, White Stupa and more!​​
